## Frustum.(constructor)

Creates a frustum initialized with an existing frustum.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(other: Frustum);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | [Frustum](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.md) | The frustum to copy from. |
